[色]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 爪 ( “ claw; hand ” ) + 卩 ( “ kneeling person ” ) – complexion.
Shuowen interprets this character as an ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 人 ( “ person; human ” ) + 卩 ( “ etiquette ” ) – complexion.
Compare 印 , 抑 .
Sometimes, especially in folk etymology, the character is misinterpreted as a proto-form of 絕 . The bottom part is unrelated to 巴 .

[巴]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) — a huge snake . However, in 邑 and 色 (both Kangxi radicals) it represents a person kneeling.
